content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® f845 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com hot cakes blanket stitch crochet baby blanket materials hot cakes 2-200g cakes shown in color 5 - pastel mix size approx 28 x 32 hook size l gauge approx 1 cluster = 1 chain 90 loosely row 1 2 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook * skip 2 chain single_crochet 2dc in next st repeat from * across row ending with skip 2 chain single_crochet in last chain chain 2 turn row 2 2 double_crochet in first single_crochet *skip next 2 double_crochet single_crochet 2dc in next single_crochet repeat from * across row ending with a single_crochet in the top of the chain 2 chain 2 turn continue repeating row 2 until total length is about 32 fasten_off weave in all ends ©2018 plymouth yarn co 040218jbt abbreviations chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch
